summary: I cried harder watching Avengers: Endgame than I did at my own High School Graduation.

I also got into a car wreck on my way to Graduation and flipped my car twice and still cried harder in the theater.

body:
meeting tom

  • you were a teacher at paddy’s primary school when you first met
  • Tom had come to pick him up, and since it was the first time he had you legally had to go out and greet him to make sure it was someone paddy knew
  • Safety protocol and all
  • Tom found himself asking if he could pick up his brother just so he could see you again
  • And eventually he asked if he could take you to dinner
  • And you were hesitant at first, because you were his younger brothers teacher
  • But he convinced you, and you found yourself sat across from him later that week
  • It was the best date you had been on, not that you dated a lot
  • Tom was perfect, a real gentlemen but not to the point where he seemed plain boring
  • the dates became more frequent, and you both decided that maybe you should put a name to it
  • And that’s how you met your boyfriend, Tom Holland

summary: “Everybody wants a happy ending, right? But it doesn't always roll that way. Maybe this time.” “I'm hoping, if you play this...
body:
“Everybody wants a happy ending, right? But it doesn’t always roll that way. Maybe this time.”

“I’m hoping, if you play this back, it’s in celebration. I hope families are reunited.”

“I found the time and I recorded a little greeting, in the case of an untimely death. On my part. Not that death in any time isn’t untimely.”

“But, then again, that’s the hero gig. Part of the journey is the end.”

“Everything’s gonna work out exactly the way it’s supposed to.”

“I love you 3000.”

summary: Morgan looked like him. And in the early morning before the sun came up she sounded like him too. Her words fell away like his,...
body:
Morgan looked like him. And in the early morning before the sun came up she sounded like him too. Her words fell away like his, puntuacted with a rasp of her throat. Her mouth moved like his — her eyes sparkled like his. Pepper often pushed the bangs from her daughter’s forehead and stared openly into her eyes, feeling for his presence. And seeing all of him there.

Morgan was wearing the helmet the day she said, “I think he would say, ‘Happy Mother’s Day!’ just like that.” She threw her arms up, bouncing onto her toes.

Pepper was watering the plants on the patio. Morgan was in the grass below the steps, her very own Iron Man helmet fastened to her head. It had taken her a while to wear it again. Pepper was glad she did.

“What?” Pepper laughed.

“It’s Mother’s Day,” Morgan said. Her little voice through the suit’s helmet sounded comically mechanical; high pitched like whirring cables. It had too much room to echo and Pepper thought — instinctively — that Tony should fix it. She amended the thought to include Peter instead, the Spider-Man. He could tinker with it for her. He was here.

Tony was not.

“He would say, ‘Happy Mother’s Day!’ and then he would kiss you,” Morgan went on and touched the bulging temple of the helmet, “here.”

Pepper smiled. “He would, wouldn’t he.”

Morgan lifted the too-large helmet from her head. She set it down neatly in the grass, mindful of the patchy areas where the recent rain had softened the ground. She climbed the steps to the patio where Pepper stood spritzing her young, leafy lemon tree. Her eyes on Pepper’s were so familiar. They were intelligent, kind. Everlasting.

Morgan motioned for her mother to come down to her level, so Pepper did. “Like this,” Morgan said, and then took her mother’s face between her two tiny hands and kissed her left temple. “Happy Mother’s Day!”

Pepper didn’t cry. She was proud for that, actually. But she drew her daughter in, swept her lips over Morgan’s cheeks and nose. She said, “I love you three thousand.”

Morgan wound her arms around her mother’s neck, whispered, “I love you three thousand, Mama.”

summary: sheronm replied to your post  “snoozingcat replied to your post  “I have Iron Man Armored Adventures...” This sounds awesome! I...
body:
sheronm replied to your post “snoozingcat replied to your post “I have Iron Man Armored Adventures…”

This sounds awesome! I really need to watch it sometime

I highly recommend Iron Man Armored Adventures, featuring blue-eyed Teen!Tony with sidekicks Rhodey and Pepper and their adventures. Rhodey is fantastic but Pepper is an acquired taste. And their frenemy, Gene Khan! The show has 2 seasons (season one is available on Amazon streaming but you can find the show in the usual places). The show’s animation is early CGI but comes off as more of an art choice than evolving art technology.

The show features: Teen!Justin Hammer, who gets his hands on Stark International at one point; Whitney Stane, who turns into Madame Mask; Obadiah Stane; Rhodey’s mom, Roberta, Super-Lawyer Supreme; Frozen-Steve-in-a-Tank; Andy the Awesome Android; the Controller in an interpretation of the Ty Stone/Dreamvision story; lots of minor traditional Iron Man enemies; appearances by Fury, Hill, Black Panther, Doctor Doom, teen!Black Widow and teen!Hawkeye; Hulk, Jean Grey; and sprinkles of references to other characters in the Marvel universe. Tony even starts his own company – Stark Solutions! – when he loses Stark International. Best version of Howard Stark anywhere. There is so so much more.

In one episode, Andros Stark comes from the future to stop Tony from creating a techno-virus. What I prefer to think is that Andros was surprised at seeing Tony without his other grandfather, Steve. But that’s just me.

Always up for talking about the animated series!

blog.name: marvel-unikitty
blog.title: I Want To Make Friends-
blog.description:
Marvel and Unikitty! (The show),

are two of my main Fandoms. I like to write Tickle Fanfics (w/ships sometimes) and I hope to make friends here.

~IronDad and SpiderSon is life, Eagleator x Hawkodile and IronStrange are OTP~

body:
“Admit it.” (IronStrange)

*FLUUUUUUFFFF*

Stephen Strange and Tony Stark are budding heads again about which his better. Science or Magic.

The two of them continue to argue but then it turns into something different for the two heroes. (This is my first IronStrange AND Marvel fanfic so forgive me if it’s bad-)

————————————————————

“Are we seriously going to go through this again? Science tops magic!” Shouted an annoyed Tony Stark to the ‘wizard’ in his office, also known as Stephen Strange.

The two have been budding heads once again about which was better. The research and inventions of science, or the spells and special books of magic. The two just couldn’t seem to see each other in person without the argument being brought up again.

This caused the other Avengers to try keeping the two away from each other, but due to the fact that Tony and Stephen were the only ones in the tower right now, they just made a sudden to bump into each other.

Stephen wanted to make the choice of at least trying to get along with the billionaire genius. But he now realized that was a mistake…

Now here the two were, in Tony’s office, arguing about which was better, Science or Magic.

Stephen rolled his eyes “I can portal to another plantet with my magic. Is that something one of your silly gadgets can do?” He said picking screw off of Mr. Stark’s desk and flicking it at him but Tony dodged the small object, the screw making a small “clink” as it hit the floor “Didn’t think so.”

“Do not touch anything on my desk you wizard!” Tony said picking up the screw and stepping in front of Strange for him to get away from his things “At least my office doesn’t look like something from Harry Potter.” He said as his lip curled into a smirk.

“I will portal you into a fucking volcano!” Strange glared at the billionaire as he pointed at him “That would be better because then that would mean I won’t be here talking to you.” Responded Tony as he set Stephen’s hand down. But with his middle finger.

As much as Strange would have loved to actually portal Mr. Stark into a volcano, he instead took a deep breath and sighed “We really need to stop arguing about this.” Stephen sighed then looked at Tony “Is there some way I can…at least try to get along with you?”

Tony pretended to think as he gazed up at the ceiling before looking back at the “wizard” with a slight smirk “We can get along,” he started “IF you admit science is better.”

Stephen stared at Tony then rolled his eyes “Are you seriously wanting to do this-?” He glared then stood up straight with his arms crossed on his chest “Only if you prove it.”

Tony almost stared at Stephen in disbelief. But if he wanted it to be played that way, he’ll get it! The billionaire then tried to think of something that would make the “wizard” change his mind. He wanted Strange to admit it out loud.

Suddenly, the thought of his newest invention and grinned “In that case,” Tony said “I’ll show you my lastet invention.” He walked over to a draw in his desk and pulled out six bracelets. But these ones were metal, and had what seemed to be a green glowing dot on it.

“Bracelets? I thought I’d get to see something better.” Strange scoffed crossing his arms while rolling his eyes. But Tony only smirked “I haven’t explained what it does yet.” He said “Why don’t you test them out?”

Strange looked at him “How do I know you’re not trying to trick me?” He glared. Mr Stark rolled his eyes “If I was going to trick you, I would have done so by now.” He sighed. With no other choice, Stephen took one then put them on his wrists but Tony took the other four. Two on the “wizards” ankles, extending one out and putting it around his waist, but held onto the last one.

Stephen looked at Tony confused “Do they do something or what?”

Tony grinned “You’ll see.” Before, Strange could respond, the glowing green dot on the bracelets turned red and the sixth bracelets attacked Stephens cloak and restraining it to the floor. The sorcerers eyes widened as he stared at the bracelets then back at Tony “What are these things suppose to dohohohahaha-?TONY!” Strange laughed out as he felt the barcelets around his neck, wrists, and ankles vibrate. “What’s wrong, doc?” Tony smirked “Ticklish?”

“F-Fuck you!” Stephen laughed. The bracelets vibrated through his clothes and feeling the ones on his ankles tickle his feet and the ones on his wrists vibrating up to his armpits. Strange collapsed to his knees but soon regretted his choice once the bracelets seemed to connect themselves to the floor. He tried to get the tickle-devices off his wrists but they connected together like handcuffs.

“W-WHY WOHOHOHOULD YOU MAHAHAKE SOMEHEHEHETHING LIKE THIHIHIHIS?!” He laughed as his face turned red of both embarrassment and anger. The person he had been arguing for weeks about finding out one of his weaknesses? This was beyond humiliating. The billionaire shrugged “I was going to have Peter try them first,” he smirked “But this is more entertaining.”

“RELAHAHASE MEHEHE YOHOHOU AHAHAHASSHOLE AHAHAHAHAHA!” Tony shrugged “I will,” he said “If you admit Science is better than Magic.”

Strange glared at him. Or, at least tried to “NEHEHEVER!” He giggled out “Then I’m not going to make them stop until you admit it.” Tony sighed as he sat in the chair at his desk as he watched the “wizard” get tortured.

A few minutes passed and Stephen could feel tears of laughter in his eyes. Meanwhile, Tony casually sat in his chair as he read a book like nothing was happening but looked up a few times to watch the tortured doctor and smirked. As he continued to watch, he decided to join in.

Tony got up from his chair and when to the right side of Strange before both hands tickled his sides and it made Stephen laugh louder as he tried to protect his side from Mr Starks fingers “LEHEHET MEHE GOHOHAHAHA!” Laughed the doctor.

Tony chuckled “Amit Science is better than Magic.” He tickled him faster “Admit it.” The billionaire wouldn’t say it out loud, but he actually thought it was cute to see Stephen like this. Not helpless, just cute. His laughter was beautiful and he thought his face was adorable in this situation.

Luckily everything was secretly being recorded by FRIDAY so Tony could rewatch this. “Admit it!” He said as his hands drifted up to Stephen’s ribcage and he watched as a tear of laughter roll down Strange’s face.

Strange couldn’t take the tickling much longer. But he wasn’t going to say it! He tried to think of something he could do to get out of this situation, he couldn’t concentrate to use his magic and his cloak was restrained, what could he do?

‘So Tony is wanting to play it like this, huh? Then he’ll get a taste of his own medicine!’ Thought Stephen Strange as he set an idea in his mind.

“OKAY OKAY!” He laughed “S-SCIEHEHEINCE IS BETTEHEHEHER! JUST RELEASE MEHEHEHE!”

Tony grinned, actually believing him “Glad we can agree, Mister Strange.” He said turning off the bracelets and letting him go. Strange only became more determined to get revenge on him.

As he panted for breath, he watched Mr Stark put the bracelets back. His back facing towards Stephen so he couldn’t see what he was up to.

“Anyways, glad I could—what? Hey!” Tony yelped in surprise as a red cloak attacked him and tackled him to the ground. He didn’t know this cloak could be so strong.

As Stark tried to fight back and kick his legs, the cloak attacked him and tied his legs together and golden restraints appeared on his wrists before pinning them above his head. Tony squirmed to try breaking free but it was no use. He then looked to see Stephen still panting for breath and glaring down at him.

“You shouldn’t have done that,” Stephen panted “And it’s Doctor Strange to you.” He then smirked “I think you should have a taste of your own medicine.” Doctor Strange said. He then summoned feathers with his hands. They were pink and they looked like feathers, but did they feel like feathers?

Two gently slided up and down the billionaires side and another on his belly. Yup, they definitely felt like feathers.

Tony immediately burst into helpless chuckles as he tried to squirm away from the feathers but he couldn’t get away now.

“I’ll let you go on one condition,” Strange said sitting next to Mr Stark and watching his revenge “Amit Magic is better than science.” He smirked.

Tony looked at him “WAIT—BUT YOU SAID-!”

“I lied.” Stephen said “Now admit it, then I’ll let you go.”

Tony tried to look at him angrily but laughter corrupted him. How could he have fallen for this so easily!? He should have known better, but how was he going to get out of this now?

“FRIDAY! CAHAHALL—!” Tony laughed but his mouth was quickly covered by no one other than Stephen Strange “I don’t think so, Mr Stark.” He said “Admit Magic is better than Science.” He summoned another feather and his tickled Tony’s chest

“Admit it—EW! Did you just lick my hand!?” Yelled a disgusted Stephen as he pulled away his hand from Tony’s mouth and wiped his on his clothing. Tony laughed. Not just from the tickling, but getting the doctor disgusted like that.

After Stephen wiped away the saliva off his hand, he blushed before looking at Tony “You’re just begging for it now!” Strange then summoned another two feathers and they tickled Tony’s hips. The sorcerers anger towards the billionaire then fanished and a smirk curled onto his lips “Iron Man ticklish?” He grinned “I’d have to see it to believe it.”

Tony just laughed loudly in response “F-FUHUHUHUCK YOHOHOU!” He blushed of embarrassment. He never wanted anyone to find out about his secret weakness, especially Stephen! Stark tried to think of some way out of this but if he could manage to escape, Stephen’s cloak would only catch him. Even if he had a chance to run.

A few minutes had passed and Stephen just sat next to Tony while playing with a ball he summoned to entertain himself, but still thought iron-man’s torture was very entertaining as well. He decided to have some of his own fun and dug his hands into Tony Stark’s armpits.

Tony laughed even harder and tears of laughter started rolling down his cheeks.

Stephen of course noticed this and grinned, but at the same time, he couldn’t help but feel pity for Mr Stark. He was probably nearly breathless, but it hasn’t been nearly as long as Tony tortured him.

At least Strange had pity on him, something he thought Tony didn’t feel on him when he was being tickle- tortured.

After a few seconds, the tickling stopped and the feathers disappeared, at the same time the golden restraits that held Tony’s wrists down.

Strange’s cloak returned to him “I only stopped because if I had done it worse, I’d be no better than you are.” He lied. Tony just rolled his eyes “Whatever.” He then chuckled again “I still got you to say Science is better than Magic.”

Stephen glared then summoned a feather “I will continue!”

Tony backed away a bit “Okay, okay.” He panted to breath as he sat up with Strange and looked at him. He smirked “I had no idea you could be so ticklish.” Tony said “By the way, I had FRIDAY record everything.”

“You did what?!” Stephen’s face turned red and he covered it with his hands. Tony couldn’t help but laugh “D-Don’t worry,” he panted with a smirk “I won’t show anyone.”

The sorcerer then looked at Tony “You do realize FRIDAY also recorded me getting revenge on you as well, right?” He smirked.

Tony’s smirk disappeared and he hid his face as he sighed “I didn’t think about that.”

Now Stephen let out a chuckle. He didn’t need to see the billionaire’s face to know he was blushing of embarrassment “And look who’s talking, I didn’t know you were so ticklish! I might do that again if you ever annoy me again.” Tony glared at him “I’ll put those bracelets back on you while you’re asleep.”

Stephen just chuckled “Okay, okay.”

A few seconds passed and the two sat in silence.

“So,” Stephen finally said “Are we going to put this argument aside?” The two looked at each other.

“Sure,” Tony said “Just say Science is better again.”

Stephen sighed before glaring at him but then grinned as he poked Stark’s side, which made Tony chuckle and back away a bit “I was joking!” He giggled.

“You better be!” The sorcerer giggled with him.

The two continue to chuckle until Tony let out a yawn “I have to admit,” he smiled “All of the tickling tired me out.” He said looking at Strange sleepily.

Stephen smiled back at him “I have to agree.” He said, trying to not yawn.

Suddenly, Stephen felt a small pressure on his side and he looked to see that Tony Stark had quickly fallen asleep on his shoulder. He wasn’t lying when Tony said the tickling made him sleepy.

The sorcerers face immediately blushed red. He didn’t want to wake Tony, and he…actually liked the warmth of Tony’s body against his. Stephen hesitated, but gently turned his body and held Tony tight to his chest and gently stroking his hair.

Strange smiled as he watched Stark sleep peacefully. He then placed his lips on Tony’s forehead and smelling his hair. It smelled like apples.

Stephen chuckled softly and placed his head on Tony’s hair.

Not long after that, his cloak wrapped itself around Tony and holding both heroes tight.

Stephen glared at the cloth “Really?” He rolled his eyes, but he secretly loved it.

He wanted this to last as long as possible. If only time could stop and he could let this moment last as long as possible.

But unknown to him, Tony secretly faked it. He warmth of Stephen’s chest was cozy and his clothes were surprisingly really soft. But he didn’t want to embarrass the “wizard”.

After a few minutes, Tony slowly wrapped his arms around Stephen’s waist with a smile across his face. And he didn’t need to look at Strange to know he was blushing as well.

That’s when he heard Stephen whisper a few words while stroking his hair

“I love you, Tony Stark.”

Tony’s face immediately began to heat up. He wanted to smash his lips onto Stephen’s so badly, but he controlled himself.

Tony just snuggled his face into Stephen’s chest before mouthing out the words.

“I love you too, Stephen Strange…~”

———————————————————

Like I said, this is my first Marvel AND IronStrange fanfic so, I’m sorry if it’s bad 😓

But, I hope you enjoyed it ^^

Strange glared at him. Or, at least tried to “NEHEHEVER!” He giggled out “Then I’m not going to make them stop until you admit it.” Tony sighed as he sat in the chair at his desk as he watched the “wizard” get tortured.

A few minutes passed and Stephen could feel tears of laughter in his eyes. Meanwhile, Tony casually sat in his chair as he read a book like nothing was happening but looked up a few times to watch the tortured doctor and smirked. As he continued to watch, he decided to join in.

Tony got up from his chair and when to the right side of Strange before both hands tickled his sides and it made Stephen laugh louder as he tried to protect his side from Mr Starks fingers “LEHEHET MEHE GOHOHAHAHA!” Laughed the doctor.

Tony chuckled “Amit Science is better than Magic.” He tickled him faster “Admit it.” The billionaire wouldn’t say it out loud, but he actually thought it was cute to see Stephen like this. Not helpless, just cute. His laughter was beautiful and he thought his face was adorable in this situation.

Luckily everything was secretly being recorded by FRIDAY so Tony could rewatch this. “Admit it!” He said as his hands drifted up to Stephen’s ribcage and he watched as a tear of laughter roll down Strange’s face.

Strange couldn’t take the tickling much longer. But he wasn’t going to say it! He tried to think of something he could do to get out of this situation, he couldn’t concentrate to use his magic and his cloak was restrained, what could he do?

‘So Tony is wanting to play it like this, huh? Then he’ll get a taste of his own medicine!’ Thought Stephen Strange as he set an idea in his mind.

“OKAY OKAY!” He laughed “S-SCIEHEHEINCE IS BETTEHEHEHER! JUST RELEASE MEHEHEHE!”

Tony grinned, actually believing him “Glad we can agree, Mister Strange.” He said turning off the bracelets and letting him go. Strange only became more determined to get revenge on him.

As he panted for breath, he watched Mr Stark put the bracelets back. His back facing towards Stephen so he couldn’t see what he was up to.

“Anyways, glad I could—what? Hey!” Tony yelped in surprise as a red cloak attacked him and tackled him to the ground. He didn’t know this cloak could be so strong.

As Stark tried to fight back and kick his legs, the cloak attacked him and tied his legs together and golden restraints appeared on his wrists before pinning them above his head. Tony squirmed to try breaking free but it was no use. He then looked to see Stephen still panting for breath and glaring down at him.

“You shouldn’t have done that,” Stephen panted “And it’s Doctor Strange to you.” He then smirked “I think you should have a taste of your own medicine.” Doctor Strange said. He then summoned feathers with his hands. They were pink and they looked like feathers, but did they feel like feathers?

Two gently slided up and down the billionaires side and another on his belly. Yup, they definitely felt like feathers.

Tony immediately burst into helpless chuckles as he tried to squirm away from the feathers but he couldn’t get away now.

“I’ll let you go on one condition,” Strange said sitting next to Mr Stark and watching his revenge “Amit Magic is better than science.” He smirked.

Tony looked at him “WAIT—BUT YOU SAID-!”

“I lied.” Stephen said “Now admit it, then I’ll let you go.”

Tony tried to look at him angrily but laughter corrupted him. How could he have fallen for this so easily!? He should have known better, but how was he going to get out of this now?

“FRIDAY! CAHAHALL—!” Tony laughed but his mouth was quickly covered by no one other than Stephen Strange “I don’t think so, Mr Stark.” He said “Admit Magic is better than Science.” He summoned another feather and his tickled Tony’s chest

“Admit it—EW! Did you just lick my hand!?” Yelled a disgusted Stephen as he pulled away his hand from Tony’s mouth and wiped his on his clothing. Tony laughed. Not just from the tickling, but getting the doctor disgusted like that.

After Stephen wiped away the saliva off his hand, he blushed before looking at Tony “You’re just begging for it now!” Strange then summoned another two feathers and they tickled Tony’s hips. The sorcerers anger towards the billionaire then fanished and a smirk curled onto his lips “Iron Man ticklish?” He grinned “I’d have to see it to believe it.”

Tony just laughed loudly in response “F-FUHUHUHUCK YOHOHOU!” He blushed of embarrassment. He never wanted anyone to find out about his secret weakness, especially Stephen! Stark tried to think of some way out of this but if he could manage to escape, Stephen’s cloak would only catch him. Even if he had a chance to run.

A few minutes had passed and Stephen just sat next to Tony while playing with a ball he summoned to entertain himself, but still thought iron-man’s torture was very entertaining as well. He decided to have some of his own fun and dug his hands into Tony Stark’s armpits.

Tony laughed even harder and tears of laughter started rolling down his cheeks.

Stephen of course noticed this and grinned, but at the same time, he couldn’t help but feel pity for Mr Stark. He was probably nearly breathless, but it hasn’t been nearly as long as Tony tortured him.

At least Strange had pity on him, something he thought Tony didn’t feel on him when he was being tickle- tortured.

After a few seconds, the tickling stopped and the feathers disappeared, at the same time the golden restraits that held Tony’s wrists down.

Strange’s cloak returned to him “I only stopped because if I had done it worse, I’d be no better than you are.” He lied. Tony just rolled his eyes “Whatever.” He then chuckled again “I still got you to say Science is better than Magic.”

Stephen glared then summoned a feather “I will continue!”

Tony backed away a bit “Okay, okay.” He panted to breath as he sat up with Strange and looked at him. He smirked “I had no idea you could be so ticklish.” Tony said “By the way, I had FRIDAY record everything.”

“You did what?!” Stephen’s face turned red and he covered it with his hands. Tony couldn’t help but laugh “D-Don’t worry,” he panted with a smirk “I won’t show anyone.”

The sorcerer then looked at Tony “You do realize FRIDAY also recorded me getting revenge on you as well, right?” He smirked.

Tony’s smirk disappeared and he hid his face as he sighed “I didn’t think about that.”

Now Stephen let out a chuckle. He didn’t need to see the billionaire’s face to know he was blushing of embarrassment “And look who’s talking, I didn’t know you were so ticklish! I might do that again if you ever annoy me again.” Tony glared at him “I’ll put those bracelets back on you while you’re asleep.”

Stephen just chuckled “Okay, okay.”

A few seconds passed and the two sat in silence.

“So,” Stephen finally said “Are we going to put this argument aside?” The two looked at each other.

“Sure,” Tony said “Just say Science is better again.”

Stephen sighed before glaring at him but then grinned as he poked Stark’s side, which made Tony chuckle and back away a bit “I was joking!” He giggled.

“You better be!” The sorcerer giggled with him.

The two continue to chuckle until Tony let out a yawn “I have to admit,” he smiled “All of the tickling tired me out.” He said looking at Strange sleepily.

Stephen smiled back at him “I have to agree.” He said, trying to not yawn.

Suddenly, Stephen felt a small pressure on his side and he looked to see that Tony Stark had quickly fallen asleep on his shoulder. He wasn’t lying when Tony said the tickling made him sleepy.

The sorcerers face immediately blushed red. He didn’t want to wake Tony, and he…actually liked the warmth of Tony’s body against his. Stephen hesitated, but gently turned his body and held Tony tight to his chest and gently stroking his hair.

Strange smiled as he watched Stark sleep peacefully. He then placed his lips on Tony’s forehead and smelling his hair. It smelled like apples.

Stephen chuckled softly and placed his head on Tony’s hair.

Not long after that, his cloak wrapped itself around Tony and holding both heroes tight.

Stephen glared at the cloth “Really?” He rolled his eyes, but he secretly loved it.

He wanted this to last as long as possible. If only time could stop and he could let this moment last as long as possible.

But unknown to him, Tony secretly faked it. He warmth of Stephen’s chest was cozy and his clothes were surprisingly really soft. But he didn’t want to embarrass the “wizard”.

After a few minutes, Tony slowly wrapped his arms around Stephen’s waist with a smile across his face. And he didn’t need to look at Strange to know he was blushing as well.

That’s when he heard Stephen whisper a few words while stroking his hair

“I love you, Tony Stark.”

Tony’s face immediately began to heat up. He wanted to smash his lips onto Stephen’s so badly, but he controlled himself.

Tony just snuggled his face into Stephen’s chest before mouthing out the words.

“I love you too, Stephen Strange…~”

———————————————————

Like I said, this is my first Marvel AND IronStrange fanfic so, I’m sorry if it’s bad 😓

But, I hope you enjoyed it ^^

“Admit it.” (IronStrange)

*FLUUUUUUFFFF*

Stephen Strange and Tony Stark are budding heads again about which his better. Science or Magic.

The two of them continue to argue but then it turns into something different for the two heroes. (This is my first IronStrange AND Marvel fanfic so forgive me if it’s bad-)

————————————————————

“Are we seriously going to go through this again? Science tops magic!” Shouted an annoyed Tony Stark to the ‘wizard’ in his office, also known as Stephen Strange.

The two have been budding heads once again about which was better. The research and inventions of science, or the spells and special books of magic. The two just couldn’t seem to see each other in person without the argument being brought up again.

This caused the other Avengers to try keeping the two away from each other, but due to the fact that Tony and Stephen were the only ones in the tower right now, they just made a sudden to bump into each other.

Stephen wanted to make the choice of at least trying to get along with the billionaire genius. But he now realized that was a mistake…

Now here the two were, in Tony’s office, arguing about which was better, Science or Magic.

Stephen rolled his eyes “I can portal to another plantet with my magic. Is that something one of your silly gadgets can do?” He said picking screw off of Mr. Stark’s desk and flicking it at him but Tony dodged the small object, the screw making a small “clink” as it hit the floor “Didn’t think so.”

“Do not touch anything on my desk you wizard!” Tony said picking up the screw and stepping in front of Strange for him to get away from his things “At least my office doesn’t look like something from Harry Potter.” He said as his lip curled into a smirk.

“I will portal you into a fucking volcano!” Strange glared at the billionaire as he pointed at him “That would be better because then that would mean I won’t be here talking to you.” Responded Tony as he set Stephen’s hand down. But with his middle finger.

As much as Strange would have loved to actually portal Mr. Stark into a volcano, he instead took a deep breath and sighed “We really need to stop arguing about this.” Stephen sighed then looked at Tony “Is there some way I can…at least try to get along with you?”

Tony pretended to think as he gazed up at the ceiling before looking back at the “wizard” with a slight smirk “We can get along,” he started “IF you admit science is better.”

Stephen stared at Tony then rolled his eyes “Are you seriously wanting to do this-?” He glared then stood up straight with his arms crossed on his chest “Only if you prove it.”

Tony almost stared at Stephen in disbelief. But if he wanted it to be played that way, he’ll get it! The billionaire then tried to think of something that would make the “wizard” change his mind. He wanted Strange to admit it out loud.

“Bracelets? I thought I’d get to see something better.” Strange scoffed crossing his arms while rolling his eyes. But Tony only smirked “I haven’t explained what it does yet.” He said “Why don’t you test them out?”

Strange looked at him “How do I know you’re not trying to trick me?” He glared. Mr Stark rolled his eyes “If I was going to trick you, I would have done so by now.” He sighed. Two on the “wizards” ankles, extending one out and putting it around his waist, but held onto the last one.

tags: i'm so mad at whoever decided to delete the kiss
summary: You're telling me this kiss was supposed to be in the movie but the Russo brothers decided to delete it? Why? Tony just spent...
body:
You’re telling me this kiss was supposed to be in the movie but the Russo brothers decided to delete it? Why? Tony just spent five years mourning the death of his son, doing what he did not only for the greater good but to have back his kid, and I think it’s completely normal that, being overwhelmed by the relief for seeing Peter again, he would not only hug but also kiss him. The hug was amazing, but the kiss? That would have been the death of us, another small yet emotionally powerful detail that would have made us suffer even more the death of Tony and Peter’s reaction to it.

Also, that was not a completely different scene, they were only like what, five or six seconds after the original scene, so why delete it? I refuse to accept that they had no time to put it in the movie, so there had to be another reason. I don’t think it has something to do with the Starker shippers, mostly because at this point I think that everyone should have understood how theirs is the purest and softest father-son relationship ever (and probably they did not even knew there was someone out there shipping them), so I truly do not understand why, they’d better give us some valid motivation for mutilating such a perfect performance between Robert and Tom.

I hope they’ll show this scene in the dvd with all the other deleted scenes because we were robbed and we deserve to have these gifs in hd, especially since Far From Home will destroy what remained of us after Endgame.

trail.content_raw:
You’re telling me this kiss was supposed to be in the movie but the Russo brothers decided to delete it? Why? Tony just spent five years mourning the death of his son, doing what he did not only for the greater good but to have back his kid, and I think it’s completely normal that, being overwhelmed by the relief for seeing Peter again, he would not only hug but also kiss him. The hug was amazing, but the kiss? That would have been the death of us, another small yet emotionally powerful detail that would have made us suffer even more the death of Tony and Peter’s reaction to it.

Also, that was not a completely different scene, they were only like what, five or six seconds after the original scene, so why delete it? I refuse to accept that they had no time to put it in the movie, so there had to be another reason. I don’t think it has something to do with the Starker shippers, mostly because at this point I think that everyone should have understood how theirs is the purest and softest father-son relationship ever (and probably they did not even knew there was someone out there shipping them), so I truly do not understand why, they’d better give us some valid motivation for mutilating such a perfect performance between Robert and Tom.

I hope they’ll show this scene in the dvd with all the other deleted scenes because we were robbed and we deserve to have these gifs in hd, especially since Far From Home will destroy what remained of us after Endgame.

title: Captain America: The New Avenger
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2LzdFPA

by PrincessofAragon212

The Battle of Johannesburg results in the defeat of the Hulk. However, it is due to the efforts of twenty seven year old Black American by the name of Alyssa Hamilton. She disappears after the chaos, though her actions eventually gain the attention of the Avengers. In desperate need of help, Alyssa is asked to aid in the defeat of Ultron and she reluctantly agrees. This brings her into a world she has not interacted with much, and all under the watchful gaze of Captain America. Will sparks fly between the two? And how will the affect the Avengers and the world?
